docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, July 8 The election triumph yesterday of Dr. Arturo Illia and his resurgent Popular Radical party was hailed widely today as a victory for moderation and a smashing defeat for Juan D. Peron, the former dictator.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, July 8 The election triumph yesterday of Dr. Arturo Illia and his resurgent Popular Radical party was hailed widely today as a victory for moderation and a smashing defeat for Juan D. Peron, the former dictator.
docs.abstract: Illia leads with most votes in; Popular Radical party success hailed as victory for moderation and smashing defeat for Peron; party will need help from other parties before Illia can be assured of Pres; data on votes for Pres electors; army jubilant; Popular Radicals lead in Cong vote; Frondizi repudiated by own party

headline.main: ARGENTINES HAIL PERONIST SETBACK; Victory for Moderates Seen in Vote for Presidency  Illia Holds Big Lead Frondizi Discredited Peronist Strategy Fails ARGENTINES HAIL PERONIST DEFEAT Army Chiefs Jubilant

byline.original: By EDWARD C. BURKS Special to the New York Times

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, July 11 (AP) Torn and seared by explosions and fire an Argentine river boat loaded with passengers sank today in the River Plate estuary.
